long_description: Scouts, mountaineers and alpinists will appreciate the lightweight and compact design of this traditional REI mess kit. Teflon(R) Classic nonstick coating on 1 qt. pot and 7.5 in. frypan makes cleanups easy. Aluminum construction encourages even heat distribution for accurate cooking. Polypropylene bowl and cup are sturdy enough to handle boiling water and hot foods. Included pot lifter attaches to exterior brackets on the pot and frypan to preserve nonstick finish. Frypan doubles as a pot lid. Includes a storage stuff sack.
short_description: Scouts, mountaineers and alpinists will appreciate the lightweight and compact design of this traditional REI mess kit.
